e_subtitle: This activity will help you explore and define the three scope levels.
e_list:
1. Read each example on the next activity screen that appears one at a time.

  2. Drag the example to the scope level to which you think it belongs.

  3. If you drag it incorrectly, the example will go back in line and you'll get another chance to categorize it correctly.

  4. The feedback will guide you to make the right choices.
e_text: When youâ€™re ready, select Start to begin.
